articles.title: About me
articles.description: Some additional details about the website
articles.contents: Hi! I am currently a 1st year PhD student at Brown CLPS. Before coming to Brown, I was an undergraduate at Smith College majoring in Linguistics and Statistical & Data Sciences. While working with Prof. Jill de Villiers at Smith, I developed interest in studying the relationship between language and thought. I’m interested in understanding how children and adults represent - or learn to represent - complex meanings of linguistic constructions in their mind.
